{{Wired embedded system |brand=Motorola |model=MB7420 |asin=B01A1E6BA2 |is_manuf=No |type=cable modem |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM33843D |fla1=4 MiB |ram1=128 MiB |lan_speed=1G |lan_ports=1 |flags=DOCSIS 3.0 }} {{TagLine|}} :{{ProductPage|https://motorolanetwork.com/mb7420.html}}{{SupportPage|http://motorolacable.com/support/MB7420/}} [http://www.motorolacable.com/documents/MB7420-DataSheet-34915revB.pdf Datasheet]
16x4 DOCSIS 3.0 cable modem * 16 downstream channels for speeds up to 686 Mbps * 4 upstream channels for speeds up to 123 Mbps<!--
-->{{CableModemSpec |down_c=16 |up_c=4 }}
[http://www.motorolacable.com/documents/MB7420-DataSheet-34915revB.pdf This datasheet] says that the Core Chipset is a Broadcom BCM33843D.
